member.name: T:NReco.InvokeMethod
member.summary: Invoke object's method that is most compatible with provided arguments

member.name: T:NReco.Linq.ILambdaValue
member.summary: Represents a value in expressions produced by .

member.name: T:NReco.Linq.IValueComparer
member.summary: Exposes a method that compares two objects.
member.remarks: Unlike this interface allows to return null as comparison result for case when values cannot be compared without throwing an exception.

member.name: M:NReco.Linq.IValueComparer.Compare(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Compares two objects and returns a value indicating whether one is less than, equal to, or greater than the other.
member.returns: A signed integer that indicates the relative values of x and y or null if values cannot be compared.

member.name: T:NReco.Linq.LambdaParameterWrapper
member.summary: This is wrapper that makes runtime types conversions real.

member.name: T:NReco.Linq.LambdaParser
member.summary: Runtime parser for string expressions (formulas, method calls etc) into LINQ expression tree or lambda delegate.

member.name: P:NReco.Linq.LambdaParser.UseCache
member.summary: Gets or sets whether LambdaParser should use the cache for parsed expressions.

member.name: P:NReco.Linq.LambdaParser.AllowSingleEqualSign
member.summary: Allows usage of "=" for equality comparison (in addition to "=="). False by default.

member.name: P:NReco.Linq.LambdaParser.Comparer
member.summary: Gets value comparer used by the parser for comparison operators.

member.name: T:NReco.Linq.LambdaParserException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when lambda expression parse error occurs

member.name: P:NReco.Linq.LambdaParserException.Index
member.summary: Parser position where syntax error occurs

member.name: T:NReco.Linq.ValueComparer
member.summary: Generic "by value" comparer that uses IComparable and can compare arrays/lists.

member.name: P:NReco.Linq.ValueComparer.FormatProvider
member.summary: Gets or sets format provider used for Convert.ChangeType (InvariantCulture by default).

member.name: P:NReco.Linq.ValueComparer.SuppressErrors
member.summary: Determines how ValueComparer handles comparison exceptions (by default is false: convert exceptions are thrown).

member.name: P:NReco.Linq.ValueComparer.NullComparison
member.summary: Determines how ValueComparer handles comparison with nulls (default is "MinValue" mode).

member.name: F:NReco.Linq.ValueComparer.NullComparisonMode.MinValue
member.summary: Null compared as "MinValue" (affects less-than and greater-than comparisons).
member.remarks: This is default behaviour expected for and described in MSDN.

member.name: F:NReco.Linq.ValueComparer.NullComparisonMode.Sql
member.summary: Null cannot be compared to any other value (even if it is null). This is SQL-like nulls handling.
